translation.Sou apaixonado por tecnologia e novos de: I am passionate about technology and new challenges and always driven to solve problems! I love animals, One Piece, and cars. I have been working for 2 years as a Fullstack Developer acting as a Freelancer and currently, I work at Ford Motor Company Brazil.
translation.Tenho atuado como desenvolvedor fullstac: I have been working as a fullstack developer since the beginning of my career for these 2 years, always seeking to deal with new challenges and opportunities. I sought to specialize in Java, Angular and React as main stacks and I continue studying and updating myself about these technologies throughout my day to day. Throughout my career I seek to contribute with my colleagues and invest in my communication and leadership.
